<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103701</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202735</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Seeing Two Poems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sehen Von von Zwei Gedichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voir Deux Poésies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vendo Dois Poemas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vedere Due Poems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να δει δύο ποιήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ver Dos Poemas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson will teach students how to actively read a poem and identify poetic devices.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion bringt Kursteilnehmern bei, wie man 
aktiv ein Gedicht liest und poetische Einheiten kennzeichnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon enseignera à des étudiants comment 
activement lire une poésie et identifier les dispositifs poétiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição ensinará a estudantes como ler um 
poema e identificar ativamente dispositivos poéticos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione insegnerà ad allievi come 
attivamente leggere un poem ed identificare i dispositivi poetic.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα θα διδάξει τους σπουδαστές πώς να 
διαβάσει ενεργά ένα ποίημα και να προσδιορίσει τις ποιητικές 
συσκευές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección enseñará a estudiantes cómo leer 
un poema e identificar activamente los dispositivos poéticos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>

        </educational>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>

    </metadata>
  </description>
